fields.title: Rehearing Josquin:  A Sample Forum
fields.text:
CRIM forums provide a convenient way to created threaded discussions about pieces.  Each contribution is attached to a general Title, and appear as a chain of points and counterpoints attributed to individual CRIM participants.

References to CRIM pieces are automatically linked to their respective work views, provided that you use the full CRIM ID in your post:  CRIM_Model_0008, for instance, provides a link to Josquin's Ave maria.  But if you also mention CRIM_Mass_0005_1 (the Kyrie of FÃ©vin's Missa Ave maria) the system will provide a link to that piece, too. Or to refer to the entire Mass:  CRIM_Mass_0005.

All Forums that refer to a given piece in this way will be automatically linked to the "Forum Discussions" for that piece (for instance:  https://crimproject.org/pieces/CRIM_Mass_0005_1/discussions/)

You can also create automatic links to the following:

A single Relationship: <R45>
A single Observation <65>
A source:  CRIM_Source_0005
A person:  CRIM_Person_0014
